verbose_text: Among the specific mechanisms targeted by MTB are signaling pathways mediated by mitogen activated protein kinases, phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase, calcium (Ca 2+) and cytokines, such as interleukin-1 and type I interferon (IFN).
